docs.text: Welcome to HTML renderer This package is meant to render Youtube tutorial videos and reference site into the Colab or Jupyter notebooks for easy reference in future. Getting started Installation installation First let's do an easy pip installation of the library by running the following command - pip install HTMLrenderer Check the short video for quickstart -
